rows.label: qst711702_msg0001
rows.name:
How is going with test that Gororo
set to friends?

rows.label: qst711702_msg0002
rows.name:
Meh? Want more hints? Oh, that not
bode well for success... But whatever,
can give nudge in right direction.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0003
rows.name:
Are friends making sure to use
Switch Arts? That get used when
switching vanguard and rear guard.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0004
rows.name:
Depending on circumstance, sometime
this maneuver also inflict Topple!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0005
rows.name:
Looking at party of friends, Gororo
think edgy Blade-man with white hair
can probably pull off.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0007
rows.name:
Friends use precious knowledge that
Gororo offer, and Topple five enemies.
Then Gororo know you real deal!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0101
rows.name:
Meh-meh?
Faces of friends have look that say,
"We pass your test, oh great Gororo!"

rows.label: qst711702_msg0102
rows.name:
How Gororo know without even look?
Oh, Gororo is master warrior! Can tell
such thing by sense aura and so on.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0103
rows.name:
That aside, it seem that first impression
of Gororo was correct, and friends can
hold friends' own. Very good!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0104
rows.name:
That conclude this test...but there is
more test coming up in near future!
Level of difficult will be much higher!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0105
rows.name:
Also, Blade of Gororo is scouting field
for skilled Drivers over Gula way.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0106
rows.name:
If friends not have pleasure of meeting
yet, would be great if could find and
show him what friends can do.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0107
rows.name:
OK, Gororo will wait on tenderloins
for next time when can give friends
test to do! Till then!
